Text: E̩gba ki dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu fʼo̩ga Israe̩l che,
Ma nʼe̩wñ bibi-ma fʼonu e̩do̩ bo̩,
O̩jo̩ onu-wa le̩, amagboji nʼe̩do̩fulu o̩te̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma dʼo̩ga ñw o̩la-ma;
Todu ma fʼe̩do̩-ma ñwo̩che te̩ dab igbeli todu bre̩di abu ku ma kpala jo̩ anede one̩;
I chʼe-Ifraim, i fʼo̩la-wñ kpe̩gwa nyʼef amone̩ ojoji ojoji;
E̩gba kʼama alo̩, omi anʼiga-mi da-la abʼuma oji ma;
Atogwo ki chʼe-ma, todu ku ma kwobʼumi te̩ ale!
Ma la raku do̩ mi kpʼe̩do̩-ma n,
Dagba omi chaka ko ma e̩wñ kʼu la dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩-ma, ma ño̩ ñwibe e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼumi kpo̩.
Ma dabi, i muda chʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki dʼatate̩ n;
